languages.text: {n}Комиссар, бесстрашно возвышаясь среди царящей вокруг резни, звучно раздает приказы бойцам, одновременно отстреливаясь из пистолета. Завидев вас, он, не прекращая стрелять, оборачивается и кричит:{/n} "Сейчас не время болтать, Ваша Светлость. Отходите, мы прикроем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Комиссар, бесстрашно возвышаясь среди царящей вокруг резни, звучно раздает приказы бойцам, одновременно отстреливаясь из пистолета. Завидев вас, он, не прекращая стрелять, оборачивается и кричит:{/n} "Сейчас не время болтать, Ваша Светлость. Отходите, мы прикроем!"

languages.text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар, бесстрашно возвышаясь среди царящей вокруг резни, звучно раздает приказы бойцам, одновременно отстреливаясь из пистолета. Завидев вас, он, не прекращая стрелять, оборачивается и кричит:{/n} "Сейчас не время болтать, Ваша Светлость. Отходите, мы прикроем!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

{n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

{n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

{n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

{n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

languages.text: {n}在这场血战之中，政委毫不畏惧地挺立在战场上。他一边朝战士们发号施令，一边用他的手枪猛烈开火。他看到了你，一边继续射击，一边转过头来，高喊道。{/n}“这种时候可不适合聊天，大人！快走吧，我们来掩护你！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}在这场血战之中，政委毫不畏惧地挺立在战场上。他一边朝战士们发号施令，一边用他的手枪猛烈开火。他看到了你，一边继续射击，一边转过头来，高喊道。{/n}“这种时候可不适合聊天，大人！快走吧，我们来掩护你！”

languages.text: {n}殺戮の上に大胆に立つコミッサーは、ピストルを連射しながら戦士たちに大声で命令を出す。彼はこちらに気づくと振り返り、相変わらず撃つ手を止めることなく叫んだ。{/n}「陛下、ここにいては危険です！ここは我々に任せて逃げてください！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}殺戮の上に大胆に立つコミッサーは、ピストルを連射しながら戦士たちに大声で命令を出す。彼はこちらに気づくと振り返り、相変わらず撃つ手を止めることなく叫んだ。{/n}「陛下、ここにいては危険です！ここは我々に任せて逃げてください！」

languages.text: {n}El Comisario, que se yergue por encima de la masacre sin temor alguno, grita órdenes a sus tropas mientras dispara su pistola. Al verte, se gira y se dirige a ti sin dejar de disparar:{/n} «¡No es buen momento, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Vaya, le cubriremos!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario, que se yergue por encima de la masacre sin temor alguno, grita órdenes a sus tropas mientras dispara su pistola. Al verte, se gira y se dirige a ti sin dejar de disparar:{/n} «¡No es buen momento, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡Vaya, le cubriremos!».

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

languages.text: {n}Dominant le carnage de toute sa stature, le commissaire aboie des ordres aux combattants tout en tirant devant lui avec son pistolet. Lorsqu'il remarque enfin votre présence, il tourne la tête vers vous sans pour autant cesser de faire pleuvoir la mort sur ses adversaires :{/n} « C'est pas franchement le moment, Votre Seigneurie ! Allez-y, on vous couvre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dominant le carnage de toute sa stature, le commissaire aboie des ordres aux combattants tout en tirant devant lui avec son pistolet. Lorsqu'il remarque enfin votre présence, il tourne la tête vers vous sans pour autant cesser de faire pleuvoir la mort sur ses adversaires :{/n} « C'est pas franchement le moment, Votre Seigneurie ! Allez-y, on vous couvre ! »

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar thront furchtlos über dem Getümmel und bellt den Kämpfern Befehle zu, während seine Pistole Feuer regnen lässt. Er blickt dich, dreht den Kopf und ruft, ohne den Beschuss zu unterbrechen:{/n} "Kein guter Zeitpunkt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Geht, wir geben Euch Deckung!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar thront furchtlos über dem Getümmel und bellt den Kämpfern Befehle zu, während seine Pistole Feuer regnen lässt. Er blickt dich, dreht den Kopf und ruft, ohne den Beschuss zu unterbrechen:{/n} "Kein guter Zeitpunkt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Geht, wir geben Euch Deckung!"

languages.text: {n}Komiser, katliamın ortasında korkusuzca dikilerek savaşçılara emirler yağdırıyor. Bir yandan da tabancasından ateş saçmaya devam ediyor. Seni gördüğü an kafasını çeviriyor, ateşi kesmeden bağırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Çok kötü bir zamana denk geldiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Gidin! Sizi koruruz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar, towering fearlessly over the carnage, is barking orders to the fighters while simultaneously raining fire with his pistol. He sees you, turns his head, and shouts, still firing,{/n} "Not a good time, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Go, we'll cover you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser, katliamın ortasında korkusuzca dikilirken savaşçılara emirler yağdırıyor. Bir yandan da tabancasından ateş saçmaya devam ediyor. Seni gördüğü an kafasını çeviriyor, ateşi kesmeden bağırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Çok kötü bir zamana denk geldiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Gidin! Sizi koruruz!"
